name: Diffused
description:
Description

Diffused is a Retro and Work themed endless mini game where the player is a police officer in a 3x3 grid dark environment and needs to grab the spawning bombs to gain a score. There are terrorists also spawning and roaming around the grid and the player (Police Officer) should avoid getting caught by not colliding with them or the police will be caught, and the game will be over.  

Controls:

1. Swipe - Swipe to move the player.

Developers:

Piolo Ambion

Richelle Cagoco

Klyde Topino

Gabriella Vilallva

Kalvin Vertucio
